OOC: I'll continue posting with Abominus if the others don't mind.
::Abomin=
us/Surgital::

    Abominus ran sideways and avoided the missiles, then sho=
t 2 blasts at Galaxor.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    Surg=
ital put front his Explobody arm to block the lightning bolts, since Explob=
ody was the most durable Bodicon.  The bolts tore into Surgital's arm, but =
not badly.  The electricty surged through him a little with each bolt, but =
he remained standing.  He couldn't die, those were his orders, after all.  =
Surgital threw a roundhouse kick at Lavatron.
